Name: Black Tie
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Garnish with physalis (cape gooseberry) on rim.
Review: Depending on the sweetness of your molasses, you may not need to add sugar syrup.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Mark Lynch at Green 19 in Dublin, Ireland.
